mention.text: the District of Columbia 's murder rate
a handgun city and a handgun area
the guns picked up in crime now

the now-infamous Saturday Night Specials , cheap handguns bought on the spur of the moment '' We find a lot of high-quality firearms , a direct result of the drug trade , '' Pedersen said '' They can afford high quality
